testsuite.name: Computhink.Script.Print_Email_Export_Negative_Scenerio
testsuite.system-out: Scenario 01: Verify email with invalid email id Click on cabinet Click on drawer Select a folder Click on cabinet Open a document Alert is not present Click on thumbnail view check box Click on SendTo icon Click on email option Enter invalid mail ID into Enter email textbox Click on Email dialog OK button User should get 'please enter valid email' warning message Invalid email ID scenario verified successfully =========================================================================================== Scenario 02: Verify blank email Clear the previous entered email in email text box Click on mail dialog OK button Blank email negative scenario verified successfully Click on refresh button
